page.title: 13MY BEST HOBBY - P.OXLEY
page.content: I AM 11 AND I KEEP 2 RABBITS, SAVE COINS, AM A BOY SCOUT AND I LIKE PLAYING FOOTBALL. MY CHIEF HOBBY THOUGH IS KARATE', MY CLUB MEETS TWICE A WEEK. 'KARATE' IS AN ART OF SELF DEFENCE AND THOSE WHO PRACTISE IT ARE NOT ALLOWED TO USE IT EXCEPT IN SELFDEFENCE. AS WE PROGRESS THROUGH IT WE ARE AWARDED BELTS OF DIFFERENT COLOURS FOR DIFFERENT GRADES. THE FIRST ONE IS WHITE AND THE LAST IS BLACK. I AM A GREEN BELT.WHEN DOING 'KARATE' WE WEAR A LOOSE TUNIC CALLED A 'GEE' AND WHEN WRESTLING WE CAN BLOCK, KICK AND PUNCH. OUR INSTRUCTOR IS A BLACK BELT AND I THINK HE'S BRILLIANT. IT IS A SPORT IN WHICH BOTH SEXES CAN TAKE PART, AND IN OUR CLUB WE HAVE 1 WOMAN, 2 GIRLS, 5 MEN AND 8 BOYS.
